chargeHist.descr: Sex with Child Age 16 or Older

result.execSummary:
The defendant Cher Hai Cha was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain GFE in fulltime employment, schooling, or combination of the two, when not fully engaged complete 10 hours community service per week.
No contact with M.C.T. unless approved by agent.

Complete SAFE program intake and any follow up.
Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling as deemed necessary by agent.
Register as Sex Offender for life.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk: Kimberly
Case Called: 11:26am
INCLUDES 14CF433, 15CF657, 15CM383
State appears by ADA Michael Puerner.  Deft appears with Atty Peter Rotter.

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
14CF433:
Ct. 2 Sex with child age 16 or older >> D&RI
15CF657:
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping- Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 3 Batter- domestic abuse >> D&RI
Ct. 5 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> D&RI
15CM383:
Ct. 1 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> D&RI
COURT grants above

PLEA: 
14CF433:
Ct. 1 2nd degree sexual assault of child >> GUILTY
15CF657:
Ct. 1 Intimidate victim/use of attempt force- domestic abuse >> GUILTY
Ct. 4 Disorderly Conduct- domestic abuse >> GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & deft guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: On each count- 14CF433 Ct. 1 & 15CF657 Ct. 1: w/hold sentencing. 3 years probation, 15CF657 Ct. 4: 2 year probation . 15CF657 Ct. 1- 6 months MCJ, with huber for work or treatment if meets jail criteria. CONDITIONS of all three counts: Complete SAFE program intake and any follow through. Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. No contact with M.C.T., unless approved by agent. Register on sex offender registry for lifetime. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two, when not fully engaged complete 10 hours of community service per week. Pay CC. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. Pay two domestic abuse surcharges. Cash bond posted be returned to poster. 

Atty Rotter to provide stipulation on jail credit to court

Adj: 11:46am
Consent and Order for Substitution of Attorneys - includes 14CF433, 15CM383, 15CF657
